The reason is because we can't find WORKSPACE_CLASSPATH_KEY when load the class. And the value is set in plugin org.eclipse.birt.report.debug.ui. But org.eclipse.birt.report.debug.ui.jar is not loaded when start 2.1.2 all-in-one. 

Reasign to GUI team to deep research.

The WORKSPACE_CLASSPATH_KEY key need set by viewer. That's a run time parameter instead of debug time parameter.
On the other word, BIRT script sitll can run withou debug plugin.
Switch to package with Eclipse 3.2.1 Relase Build
